articles.title: Sam Altman got exceptionally testy over Claude Super Bowl ads
articles.description: He posted a novella-sized rant that devolved into to calling his rival "dishonest" and "authoritarian."
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: As it preps Specs for the masses, Snap’s Q4 shows revenue growth but fewer daily users
articles.description: The company is engaged in a strategy to diversify its revenue sources as it heads into the new year.
articles.author: Lucas Ropek

articles.title: Mundi Ventures closes on €750M for Kembara, its largest deep tech and climate fund
articles.description: Spain-based deeptech and climate megafund Kembara has just completed a €750 million first close toward its €1 billion target.
articles.author: Anna Heim
